articles.title: Proteas confirmed for blockbuster tour to England in 2022 | Sport
articles.description: Cricket South Africa has confirmed a full tour for the Proteas men to England next year.
articles.content: Cricket South Africa (CSA) has confirmed a full tour for the Proteas men to England that will include three One-Day Internationals (ODIs), three T20 Internationals and three Test matches from 19 July… [+1267 chars]

articles.title: Ashes to 'hopefully' have full houses
articles.description: The Ashes will "hopefully" be played to full houses and on schedule despite a rise in Covid cases, Cricket Australia say.
articles.content:
England and Australia drew a thrilling series 2-2 in 2019, a result which saw Australia retain the urn

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
